mapper.select: SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_content AS noticeContent, notice_date AS noticeDate, notice_hits AS noticeHits, manager_id AS managerId FROM notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}

SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_content AS noticeContent, notice_date AS noticeDate, notice_hits AS noticeHits, manager_id AS managerId FROM notice ORDER BY notice_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_hits, manager_id) VALUES (#{noticeId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeDate}, #{noticeHits}, #{managerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_date = #{noticeDate}, notice_hits = #{noticeHits}, manager_id = #{managerId} WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
